artist: Nakai Chikuzan; Kan Chazan; Tachihara Kyōsho; Shinozaki Shōchiku; Kikuchi Gozan; Yanagawa Seigan; Maki Ryōkō; Kameda Ryōrai; Yamanaka Shinten'ō; Tanomura Chokunyū; Taigadō Teiryo
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: green cloth covered album containing pages of calligraphy and paintings by eleven different artists; contained within light green cardboard box
marks: Signatures, Title, and Seals signatures throughout; handwritten title ULQ on co
title: Album
